Posts.Content: For bicycling you can choose alternatives like recumbent or ElliptiGO elliptical bicycle.
Posts.Title: Exercise - How much, what type and how long...?

Posts.Content: Originally Posted by Bravehardon The important thing is that we keep exercising at something and dramatically limit how long we sit If you talking about bicycles, the ecliptical bicycle have no seat at all, and recumbent bicycle have laid-back reclining position.
Posts.Title: Exercise - How much, what type and how long...?

Posts.Content: I'm doing my usual one hour training on bike trainer in my basement. I'll have two hour good rides on weekend.
